title: Boris Johnson – 2021 Comments on COP26 Conclusions
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 10 November 2021.
content:
Negotiating teams are doing the hard yards in these final days of COP26 to turn promises into action on climate change.
